insert into m_interface_uinfo( mobile, id_card, name, is_bind_oper, is_bind_ec, is_bind_tripweb, is_bind_xxweb, is_bind_pf, is_bind_numinfo, idcard_is_vaild, name_ismatch_oper, idcard_ismatch_oper, name_ismatch_xxweb, idccard_ismatch_xxweb, name_ismatch_pf, idcard_ismatch_pf, blist_of_court, blist_of_bank, mobilblist_of_bank, circle_of_fs, macau_call_info, call_police_info, call_lawyer_info, call_court_info, phone_used_date, buy_lottery_info, address, work_address, nocturnal_info, loan_number_contact, create_date, json_str )values( #mobile#, #idCard#, #name#, #isBindOper#, #isBindEc#, #isBindTripweb#, #isBindXxweb#, #isBindPf#, #isBindNuminfo#, #idcardIsVaild#, #nameIsmatchOper#, #idcardIsmatchOper#, #nameIsmatchXxweb#, #idccardIsmatchXxweb#, #nameIsmatchPf#, #idcardIsmatchPf#, #blistOfCourt#, #blistOfBank#, #mobilblistOfBank#, #circleOfFs#, #macauCallInfo#, #callPoliceInfo#, #callLawyerInfo#, #callCourtInfo#, #phoneUedDate#, #buyLotteryInfo#, #address#, #workAddress#, #nocturnalInfo#, #loanNumberContact#, #createDate#, #json# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS id

insert into m_interface_callinfo( uinfo_id, phone_num, phone_num_loc, contact_name, needs_type, call_cnt, call_len, call_out_cnt, call_out_len, call_in_cnt, call_in_len, contact_1w, contact_1m, contact_3m, contact_3m_plus, contact_early_morning, contact_morning, contact_noon, contact_afternoon, contact_night, contact_all_day, contact_weekday, contact_weekend, contact_holiday ) values
( #contactList[].uinfo_id#, #contactList[].phone_num#, #contactList[].phone_num_loc#, #contactList[].contact_name#, #contactList[].needs_type#, #contactList[].call_cnt#, #contactList[].call_len#, #contactList[].call_out_cnt#, #contactList[].call_out_len#, #contactList[].call_in_cnt#, #contactList[].call_in_len#, #contactList[].contact_1w#, #contactList[].contact_1m#, #contactList[].contact_3m#, #contactList[].contact_3m_plus#, #contactList[].contact_early_morning#, #contactList[].contact_morning#, #contactList[].contact_noon#, #contactList[].contact_afternoon#, #contactList[].contact_night#, #contactList[].contact_all_day#, #contactList[].contact_weekday#, #contactList[].contact_weekend#, #contactList[].contact_holiday# )
